Package ca.hullabaloo.util.sax

Interface Summary
ContentHandlerFactory Factory for new content handlers.
ElementSelector Tells when an element is selected.
SaxElementSelector Interface to encapsulate element selection to ease the writing of XMLFilters
 

Class Summary
DocumentSplitterFilter Splits a document to different content handlers.
ProxyContentHandler Content Handler that passes the events it receives to a parent content handler.
SaxBuffer A class that can record SAX events and replay them later.
SaxBufferSource Allows you to use a SaxBuffer as a JAXP Source object
SaxCharacterConsolidationFilter Consolidates consecutive XMLFilterImpl.characters(char[],int,int) into a single characters call.
SaxElementFilter Removes selected elements from the sax stream.
SaxSimpleElementSelector Abstract class to create simple ElementSelector -- one which just checks tag name & attributes.
SaxStringReplaceFilter Replaces strings in SAX character events.
SaxTagExpanderFilter Converts escaped tags-escaped-in-text into real elements.
SAXUtils Collection of utility methods to facilitate SAX event handling.
TeeContentHandler Duplicates content handler events to two content handlers.
XMLFilterChain Provides an easy way to build a chain of XMLFilters.
